Download TIGER shapes for blocks

Source: R/blocks.R
tt_blocks.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for blocks

Usage

tt_blocks(state, county, year = 2021)

Arguments

state

FIPs, postal codes, or full name of states.

county

FIPs codes or full name of counties. Optional.

year

Integer year. Required. Years < 2012 are not currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

tt_blocks(state = 'DE', county = '001')
#> Simple feature collection with 4133 features and 15 fields
